title: Strengthening Artificial Intelligence Competencies: Java Programming Through Storytelling: Enhancing Practitioner Skills

context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can apply Java object-oriented programming syntax with 90% accuracy in simulated work environments
Learners can implement exception handling logic with over 85% success rates through simulation task resolution
By the end of instruction, 90% of learners can independently design and execute complex algorithm scenarios (arrays/collections) linked to narratives
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
